talk.abstract: As more and more of the web experience moves into the browser, enabling acesss to your application's data via asynchronous HTTP calls is increasingly more important.  Pyramid is a lightweight web framework which has several features for serviing such queries easy.
talk.description: As more and more of the web experience moves into the browser, enabling acesss to your application's data via asynchronous HTTP calls is increasingly more important.  Pyramid is a lightweight web framework which has several features for serviing such queries easy.
talk.name: Lightweight Web Services with Pyramid
talk.title: Lightweight Web Services with Pyramid
